aboutFront.descriptiontOne: It was a question of starting from a figmat mock-up to a web version with tailwindcss technologies, which is a CSS react js framework coupled with typescript that adds animation while managing responsive design.
aboutFront.descriptiontTwo: I had to go from a figmat mock-up to a web version using HTML5 tailwindcss technologies, which is a CSS framework for creating a digital agency site while managing responsive design.
aboutFront.descriptiontTree: For me, it was a question of producing the portfolio of a UX Designer with animation effects using JavaScript, without forgetting the responsive aspect, i.e. the ability to adapt to tablets and smartphones.
